text: Mee gu haga hiigai goodou, gei gu haangai goodou gi nia ‘manna’, tagadilinga meegai digi gidee e goodou mo godou maadua mmaadua i mua. Mee ne hai di mee deenei bolo gi modongoohia e goodou bolo ma hagalee go nia meegai la hua ala e haga mouli tangada, gei go nia helekai huogodoo ala e lloomoi i baahi o Dimaadua.8.3 Matthew 4.4; Luke 4.4
